3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

Sam Taggart

17 November 2020

Quick update!

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.
Note: No action is required, although if you have ThreeFold Connect installed already, you may have to update the app before the name changes on your device.

techapp

DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid

The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

Dash & Dash NEXT partners with ThreeFold

Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.
